subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|尸|吊|ls=psc|c2=p|ls2=ic|t1=body|t2=hanging}}: “something that hangs from the body”.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Derived from {{ltc-l|鳥|bird}}. Words for "bird" are commonly used to denote the genitalia in Chinese.

subSections.title: Definitions
See also

* {{q|Cantonese five profanities}} {{zh-l|鳩}}, {{zh-l|撚}}, {{zh-l|柒}}, {{zh-l|閪}}; {{zh-l|小狗懶擦鞋}}
